what.lead: Enable more people to experience different European countries,
what.text: by increasing the budget for EU exchange programmes (ERASMUS+), especially for secondary school students, apprentices and disadvantaged students.

what.lead: Make sure that everyone can keep up with a rapidly evolving society,
what.text: by extending lifelong learning to all, throughout their professional and personal lives.

what.lead: Bring education to the next level,
what.text: by increasing EU funding for teachers, school teachers, and introducing new teaching methods. This will adequately address how different students learn best and enhance their educational success.
